trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core
trans-unit.target: Getting started with .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core
trans-unit.target: Getting started with .NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core
trans-unit.target: Getting started with .NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET Core runs on [Windows](#windows), [Linux](#linux), and [macOS / OS X](#macos)
trans-unit.target: .NET Core runs on [Windows](#windows), [Linux](#linux), and [macOS / OS X](#macos)

trans-unit.source: Windows
trans-unit.target: Windows

trans-unit.source: Install .NET Core on [Windows](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#windows).
trans-unit.target: Install .NET Core on [Windows](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#windows).

trans-unit.source: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on Windows, using Visual Studio 2015](tutorials/using-on-windows.md) - Use [Visual Studio](https://www.visualstudio.com/), the full-featured integrated development environment (IDE) for Windows.
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core on Windows, using Visual Studio 2015](tutorials/using-on-windows.md) - Use [Visual Studio](https://www.visualstudio.com/), the full-featured integrated development environment (IDE) for Windows.

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - Use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor.
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - Use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is written for macOS, but Visual Studio Code also works on Windows.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is written for macOS, but Visual Studio Code also works on Windows.

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported by the following versions of Windows (both 32-bit and 64-bit):
trans-unit.target: .NET Core is supported by the following versions of Windows (both 32-bit and 64-bit):

trans-unit.source: Windows 7 SP1
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 SP1

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1

trans-unit.source: Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Windows 10

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2016 (Full Server, Server Core or Nano Server)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2016 (Full Server, Server Core or Nano Server)

trans-unit.source: Linux
trans-unit.target: Linux

trans-unit.source: Install Linux on your distribution/version:
trans-unit.target: Install Linux on your distribution/version:

trans-unit.source: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Server
trans-unit.target: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Server

trans-unit.source: Ubuntu 14.04, 16.04 & Linux Mint 17
trans-unit.target: Ubuntu 14.04, 16.04 & Linux Mint 17

trans-unit.source: Debian 8.2
trans-unit.target: Debian 8.2

trans-unit.source: Fedora 23
trans-unit.target: Fedora 23

trans-unit.source: CentOS 7.1 & Oracle Linux 7.1
trans-unit.target: CentOS 7.1 & Oracle Linux 7.1

trans-unit.source: openSUSE 13.2
trans-unit.target: openSUSE 13.2

trans-unit.source: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - Use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor.
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - Use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is written for macOS, but Visual Studio Code also works on Linux.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is written for macOS, but Visual Studio Code also works on Linux.

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported by the Linux distributions and versions listed above in the installation links.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core is supported by the Linux distributions and versions listed above in the installation links.

trans-unit.source: OS X / macOS
trans-unit.target: OS X / macOS

trans-unit.source: Install .NET Core for [Mac OS X 10.11](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#macos).
trans-unit.target: Install .NET Core for [Mac OS X 10.11](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#macos).

trans-unit.source: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - Use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor.
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - Use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor.

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported by 64-bit OS X 10.11 (El Capitan).
trans-unit.target: .NET Core is supported by 64-bit OS X 10.11 (El Capitan).

trans-unit.source: It isn't yet supported by macOS Sierra, but will be soon.
trans-unit.target: It isn't yet supported by macOS Sierra, but will be soon.
